name: Domain of Forgery: Robotic Ruse II
description:
Underwater caves, far from the patrol routes of the Maison Gardiennage, have become hives of villainy, used by bandits and smugglers. They even stole some clockwork meka.
If you can defeat the meka and their operators dwelling within, you will obtain materials with which to enhance your equipment.
disorder: After triggering Hydro-related reactions on opponents, all party members receive a 10% Hydro DMG bonus that lasts 10s. This effect can be triggered every 2s. Max 5 stacks. Characters' resistance to interruption will be increased when 5 stacks are reached.
